extends java.lang.Object

      • scheduleButtonListener

        public static void scheduleButtonListener(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt)
        This method reacts to checking or un-checking buttons associated with time slots. It calls for the methods to change the coloring of the buttons in the schedule.
        Parameters:
        evt -

      • deleteButtonActionPerformed

        public static void deleteButtonActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt)
        This method deletes all the downloaded data and enables the user to restart choosing the schedule.
        Parameters:
        evt -
